website_summaries.verdict: A mind-boggling array of crafting supplies, neatly packaged in a customizable wooden box. Hands down one of the most comprehensive crafting sets available right now.
pros: Comes with enough supplies to keep even the most enthusiastic crafters busy for months
Compartmentalized storage box makes it easy to stay organized
Unfinished box is a project in itself

customer_reviews.title: Big box. Big fun. Big commitment
customer_reviews.text: I really did not realize how big this box is until I got it. Kinda of caught me off guard. But nevertheless, the amount of artistic options for my daughters to create new things using this box is amazing. This gift set is more on the serious side when gifting someone. It’s more like a gift that a parent or grandparents can give children or even teens that will carry them forward for many years. I guess it can also serve very well for art classes for teachers. I am looking forward of using this set with my children for many years to come and joyfully cover the cost of this investment.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Packed FULL of crafting goodies!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BOX!!! First I must say I was expecting this to be a pretty good product based on the reviews but this was epic level! I buy lots of craft items and they are VERY expensive. There’s easily several hundred dollars worth of products in the box. My only complaint is that the box might break under the weight of the amount of crafting stuff in it and I wish they had included painting supplies although I don’t know where they would fit as this box was packed full! I know I will be buying this again as gifts for grandkids and other crafting people in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for a very artistic neighbor. When examining contents, I was impressed with the variety of offerings and the storage capacity as this particular young recipient is a well organized youngster. I am optimistic it will fulfill her desire to be creative using many media. I can't wait to hear her reaction about the gift after the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: LPV

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Craft Box!
customer_reviews.text: Being a crafter myself, I loved what was in this box. This was a gift for my daughter and she was overjoyed to receive this box. It had so many compartments and crafting supplies. Since we don’t have an art studio yet, this comes in handy in keeping some of her things organized. I also like that the box is unfinished wood so we can make it our own. My daughter has already decorated it. I can’t wait to see what other things this company has in store. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great assortment of craft supplies.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this wonderful box of crafts. The crafts supplies are good quality. The box is well built and the wood is sanded down. But the wood isn't finished and she has gotten a sliver from the box.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaRustebakke

customer_reviews.title: This product is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing! I gave it to my nine-year-old for Christmas she absolutely beyond loves it it comes with so many things it is beyond the value it’s amazing! Even the babysitter and family friends they came to visit commented on how awesome this product is endless possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old daughter for Christmas, she is going to love it! It's def worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product! Better than described!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loved this gift and have been using it for several months now s every time I visit I see a new creation that they have made with these materials. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Quarantine fun!!
customer_reviews.text: You guys. This box is like having AN ENTIRE CRAFT STORE suddenly AT YOUR HOUSE. The value for what you get? INSANELY GOOD. I bought this for my 9 year old to keep her creative brain fired up while we are stuck inside, and I’m not kidding, I CRIED as I opened and dig through each nook and cranny. The thoughtfulness that went into the selection of each of these incredible items is unmistakable. This is NOT CHEAP STUFF. Yes, your answer is YES. You need to buy it. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: AZ shopper guy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loved it. My only complaint was the bottom drawer was slightly broken. We were able to fix the issue with some wood glue.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: Lots of stuff though much of it is very "Feminine" The wood and hinges are very weak. One door on the top broke off very easily when it was bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Monni G.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun in one box
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Has everything you could need for diy craft projects. I think the price is still a little expensive for product.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my seven year old granddaughter for a Christmas and she was so excited that all she could talk about all day was the different craft supplies. She uses it constantly- it’s going be hard to top this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted my 11 year old from Santa. She LOVED it, and discovered all the compartments on cloud 9. So much fun, so many creative options for her crafts. Worth the buy ion my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nate F.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME 100% AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been working real hard on improving my physical, mental and emotional health and decided to reward myself with new craft supplies. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS WONDERFUL PRODUCT OF PRODUCTS 🤗😊🥰 I most definitely will be buying more Pick ME Boxes as gifts for my family & friends!!! I have no complaints whatsoever. Thank you very much!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L. Scott (Kake)

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing, my 6 year old and 3 year olds are in awe.
customer_reviews.author: Min Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Wow , what an amazing product for kids. Bought it for my niece birthday and it became a huge activity for hours and hours. So many interesting things in it that even adults can play with it. Great for any party’s or just for kids to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Nadjari

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was insanely expensive. I got it or my 9 year old sons birthday who loves to craft. It was an awesome gift that he is so happy with. i just wish a lot of the items were a little more gender neutral. other then that he will have this for his entire life. i love it. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire

product_meta.title: PICKME Mega Creation Box Craft Supplies Set | Arts & Craft All-in-One Organizer Unique 4-Tier Wooden Drawers Box - Full of 125 Different Types of Craft Supplies and Accessories to Take Anywhere
product_meta.description:
CREATIVE BOX CRAFTS CENTER - Where everything you need to be creative is in ONE BOX 
We know you! You’re that person who gets a warm fuzzy feeling as you walk through the doors of your local craft store or when you find a craft store you’ve never seen before. WE ARE YOU! 

THE FOLDING STORAGE BOX 
4-Tiers including 9 drawers full to the brim with colorful and exciting crafting supplies. 
Even the box itself is part of the creative kit and it’s there for you to put your mark on. Make it original and fabulous! We’d love to see photos. 

IN THE BOX: 
You’ll find lots of fun products to take you on a journey of crafting you could only imagine. Under each of these categories, you will find different styles and different sizes for your crafting pleasure. 
* Threads 
* Stickers 
* Crafting papers 
* Different kinds of Tapes including washi tape 
* Patches for sewing or sticking 
* Sparkly felt balls 
* Pigments 
* Sequins 
* Pipe cleaners 
* Bows 
* Lace 
* Colored pins 
* Wooden pegs 
* Glue 
* Scissors 

USE IT AT HOME OR ON THE GO Just imagine how wonderful it would be to start your crafting project knowing that everything you need is in one handy place. That’s what you get with this amazing craft box. Or, if you are a kindergarten, preschool or first-grade teacher who loves to craft with your students, this is the perfect way of taking your valuable crafting supplies to and fro. 

QUALITY TIME FOR YOU AND THE KIDS This truly is the stressless way to craft with your kids. Everything in its place at the beginning and the end of the session. The kids will love opening it up and picking their favorite supplies for their very own creation. 

THIS IS AN ORIGINAL PRODUCT BY PICKME 
You won’t find another craft supplies storage organizer like it, so it is the perfect, original gift for your favorite crafter.
feature_bullets: IF YOU CRAFT, YOU CAN’T LIVE WITHOUT OUR “CREATIVE BOX” - For the FIRST TIME EVER, we bring you this unique set of 125 highest quality assorted craft supplies (over 450 individual items) in a large wooden, 4-tier craft organizer box. Whatever your favorite craft, we’ve got you covered and you’ll never run out of your favorite supplies. All this at a price far lower than if you were to buy the products individually.

NO MORE SEARCHING THROUGH HUNDREDS OF DRAWERS TO FIND WHAT YOU NEED - The variety of crafting accessories in this ready-to-go art center for kids and adults is endless - from different kinds of thread, including fish line, to beads, stickers, papers, tapes, patches, felt balls, pigments, sequins, pipe cleaners, bows, lace, colored pins, wooden pegs and even glue and scissors.

NOT JUST A STORAGE BOX - This entire set is a craft in itself. You get a large unpainted box with 9 drawers - a blank canvas if you will - 17.7 x 13 x 9.85 inches, just waiting for your talented hands to make it into something breathtakingly unique that you can be truly proud of.

TAKE YOUR ART SUPPLIES ORGANIZER BOX ON THE ROAD - Yes, this portable organizer allows you to take your craft center wherever you go without fear of losing any of the small bibs and bobs that are so essential to your project. Perfect for preschool teachers, adult educators, going on vacation with the kids and Super Moms in general.

THE PERFECT CRAFT KIT FOR KIDS AND ADULTS ALIKE - We all have them among our friends or family. That person who looks at an inane object and knows they are going to make it into something fabulous. Any crafter would be thrilled to receive this amazing gift for birthdays, anniversaries and holidays - It’s original and most of all thoughtful and it’s going to be a best seller at Christmas this year so we recommend buying early.
